name: Miso Marinated Pork
author: Just Bento
ingredients: 300g boneless pork cutlets/chops, sliced thinly (5mm thick)
3 tbsp red miso (can just duplicate one kind)
method: Trim fat from pork chops, if they are too thick try part freezing and slicing or pound them out until about 5mm thick.
Mix all other ingredients together to form the marinade. Combine well with pork slices and marinate for at least 3 hours up to 24 (no more!)
Heat a pan over medium-high heat, add olive oil or low cal cooking spray. Cook pork slices for 2-3 mins on each side until surface is browned and crispy.
Slice into small pieces and serve over rice or as part of a bento box.
